page.title: 05Askern Catholic Church
page.content: All my family are Roman Catholic,and we attend church every Sunday at 11am at the very modern Catholic Church in Askern or at Burghwallis at 5pm.Father Burke is the priest for both these Churches. Our Church includes a group called{} {The Union Of The Catholic Mothers}who have meetings every Tuesday at the Catholic Hall. They help people like { {Children in Need}and the {Ethiopia {Appeal,}raising money through coffee mornings and jumble sales.You really should be a Catholic mother to join the group but,even though some girls are not mothers,they are able to join when they are 18. Every Wednesday and Friday the Church holds a Bingo session for people and it raises money for the Catholic Church.
